When he came back after one year he died at the hands of the king Basil.And the Roman army gathering upon him they expelled him into the land of the Muslims.And overturning it, he marched through the land with sword and captivity.and he laid waste most of the Roman land.Now in the days of the period of the Armenian calendar in the year 435, someone rebelled against the king Basil, the Roman prince Black Bardas,
